snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan's first outing alone as the Republican vice-presidential candidate he has chosen a particularly exposed high-wire appearance: a political soapbox at the Iowa State Fair.
abstract: Representative Paul D. Ryan's first outing alone as the Republican vice-presidential candidate he has chosen a particularly exposed high-wire appearance: a political soapbox at the Iowa State Fair.

headline.main: For Ryan's First Solo Outing as Candidate, a Soapbox Appearance at the Iowa State Fair
